block.p: SHEERIN-Raymond. Age 67. On August 13th, 2001. Beloved husband of Barbara. Adored father of Laurie, Raymond, Jr., Matthew and Mark. Caring stepfather of Michael Waitzman and Lisa Melartin. Loving grandfather of Katie, Noelle, Cody, Richard, Allison, Raymond, III, Lily and Alexander. Brother of John and Hugh. Memorial service 10AM Thursday, August 16th, Church of Saint Francis Xavier, 46 W. 16 St, N.Y. Memorial donations may be made to Fordham Prep Class of 1951 Legacy, Fordham Prep., East Fordham Road, Bronx, NY 10458.
